div.p: Metastasis category according to AJCC breast cancer staging recommendations.

publisher.value: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

description.value: Metastasis category according to AJCC breast cancer staging recommendations.

display.value: No detectable metastatis by clinical or radiogical examination.

definition.value: No detectable metastatis by clinical or radiogical examination.

display.value: Cancer has spread to distant organs (most often to the bones, lungs, brain, or liver).

definition.value: Cancer has spread to distant organs (most often to the bones, lungs, brain, or liver).
